title: I want to take an admission in FORE School of Management, Delhi. What are the criteria for that? - Quora
tags: Master of Business Administration Degree Advice

response.answer_text: You need to download and fill Application Form for FORE School admission. Keep checking their website and announcements for this. CAT is the only test FORE considers hence you need to ensure high (last year cut off was 84 percentile) CAT Scores. Prepare yourself well and also keep in mind at FORE they look around for Managerial qualities, comm skills, decision taking skills among other cognitive abilities apart from CAT score. All the Best.

Good choice. CAT is just one criteria in FORE. One need to show all round qualities for a potential manager / business leadership qualities for selection at FORE. Do read a lot, enhance knowledge. Start expressing your opinion without fear.
